name: entity
desc: Attack an entity, use an entity or get a list of entities around you.
note: Get a list of entities around you

parameters.name: id
parameters.desc: The ID of the entity to interact with.

parameters.name: type
parameters.desc: The type of entity to interact with.

sub_parameters.name: attack
sub_parameters.desc: Attack the entity with the type.

sub_parameters.name: use
sub_parameters.desc: Use the entity with the type.
